title: Taming the crippler
creator_credit: RKO Pathe Pictures and Jay Bonafield
brief_description: Shows the progress since 1916 of the battle to defeat poliomyelitis. Earlier devices and treatments with respirators, physical therapy, hydro-therapy, hot-packs are depicted. Concludes with the introduction of the salk vaccine.
